name: Reindeer Race and Jump agility obstacle course: Training for Christmas Day - Free
name_original: Reindeer Race and Jump agility obstacle course: Training for Christmas Day - Free
description:
TRY OUR REINDEER RACE AND JUMP AGILITY OBSTACLE COURSE : TRAINING FOR CHRISTMAS DAY GAME

Christmas is around the corner so reindeer has to train their self.

In this game, reindeer have to jump over trees, gifts, climb snow hills, all that training to be finally ready for Christmas day delivery gifts all over the world. If you collect enough gold coins then you will unlock 9 new reindeer characters.

Features:

- Unlock 9 cool reindeer characters
- Amazing graphics and effects
- Cool soundtrack
---------------
How to play?

- Lead reindeer to run
- Avoid all obstacles such as trees, gifts, climb snow hills and many more
- Unlock amazing 9 reindeer characters

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> REINDEER RACE AND JUMP AGILITY OBSTACLE COURSE : TRAINING FOR CHRISTMAS DAY GAME
